title: After you come off the Rt 140 bypass near Porters Neck towards Wilmington there is a green sign that reads \Kirkland\" The sign is located before Porters Neck Road on the rt side of Rt 17..Where or what is \"Kirkland\" ?"
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. At the intersection of Market Street and PorterÍs Neck Road is a green sign that says ñKirkland.î Can you tell me what that refers to?
